name: Ancra (itch)
description:
A fire, both purifying and binding. A corpse, lifeless but tethered. A blade, gleaming with blood. A cup, its contents cast upon the floor. Waiting to be refilled.

Ancra is a narrative driven, puzzle-horror game. 

The current demo covers the whole game, including multiple endings. Many aspects need to be fleshed out or expanded - this build is purely for testing and feedback! Pretty much everything is subject to change.
